item.title: Mapping the JNCIA-DC Blueprint
item.description: Introduction In this (very) short blog post, I’ll provide a mapping of the official JNCIA-DC objectives to some resources for learning about the topic. You may notice that several of these sections suggest studying the JNCIA-Junos or JNCIS-ENT. That’s because there’s a lot of overlap. Honestly, the right approach is probably to get your JNCIA-Junos and JNCIS-ENT before attempting the JNCIA-DC, but if you’re impatient, then hopefully this mapping helps.
